history.proof: intros a b d H. inversion H. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.tactic: inversion H as [b|b a d q r H1 H2 H3 H4 H5].

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, d : Z H : is_gcdZ a b d b0 : Z H0 : 0%Z = a H1 : b0 = b H2 : Z.abs b = d Unable to unify "is_gcdZ ?M1453 ?M1454 (gcdZ ?M1453 ?M1454)" with "Z.abs b = gcdZ 0 b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> d = gcdZ a b

Premises:
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
gcdZ = fun a b : Z => pi1 Z (is_gcdZ a b) (gcdZ_exists a b) : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments gcdZ (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive is_gcdZ : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop := gcd_OZ : forall b : Z, is_gcdZ 0 b (Z.abs b) | gcd_mod : forall b a d q r : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (0 <= r < Z.abs b)%Z -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> is_gcdZ r b d -> is_gcdZ b a d Arguments is_gcdZ (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments gcd_OZ _%Z_scope Arguments gcd_mod (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
unicity_is_gcdZ : forall a b c d : Z, is_gcdZ a b c -> is_gcdZ a b d -> d = c
gcdZ_is_gcd : forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> is_gcd Z IdZ Z.mul 0%Z a b d
positive_is_gcdZ : forall a b d : Z, is_gcdZ a b d -> (0 <= d)%Z
gcd_mod : forall b a d q r : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (0 <= r < Z.abs b)%Z -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> is_gcdZ r b d -> is_gcdZ b a d
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_unique : forall a b c d : Z, Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b c -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d -> c = d \/ c = (- d)%Z
Znumtheory.Euclid_intro : forall a b u v d : Z, (u * a + v * b)%Z = d -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d -> Znumtheory.Euclid a b
gcd_unicity_apart_sign : forall a b c d : Z, is_gcd Z IdZ Z.mul 0%Z a b c -> is_gcd Z IdZ Z.mul 0%Z a b d -> d = c \/ d = (- c)%Z
is_gcdZ_ind : forall P : Z -> Z -> Z -> Prop, (forall b : Z, P 0%Z b (Z.abs b)) -> (forall b a d q r : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (0 <= r < Z.abs b)%Z -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> is_gcdZ r b d -> P r b d -> P b a d) -> forall z z0 z1 : Z, is_gcdZ z z0 z1 -> P z z0 z1
is_gcdZ_sind : forall P : Z -> Z -> Z -> SProp, (forall b : Z, P 0%Z b (Z.abs b)) -> (forall b a d q r : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (0 <= r < Z.abs b)%Z -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> is_gcdZ r b d -> P r b d -> P b a d) -> forall z z0 z1 : Z, is_gcdZ z z0 z1 -> P z z0 z1
Znumtheory.Bezout_ind : forall (a b d : Z) (P : Prop), (forall u v : Z, (u * a + v * b)%Z = d -> P) -> Znumtheory.Bezout a b d -> P
Inductive Euclid (a b : Z) : Set := Euclid_intro : forall u v d : Z, (u * a + v * b)%Z = d -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d -> Znumtheory.Euclid a b Arguments Znumtheory.Euclid (_ _)%Z_scope Arguments Znumtheory.Euclid_intro (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Bezout (a b d : Z) : Prop := Bezout_intro : forall u v : Z, (u * a + v * b)%Z = d -> Znumtheory.Bezout a b d Arguments Znumtheory.Bezout (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Znumtheory.Bezout_intro (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
Znumtheory.Euclid_ind : forall (a b : Z) (P : Znumtheory.Euclid a b -> Prop), (forall (u v d : Z) (e : (u * a + v * b)%Z = d) (z : Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d), P (Znumtheory.Euclid_intro a b u v d e z)) -> forall e : Znumtheory.Euclid a b, P e
div_add : forall (S : Set) (A : S -> Prop) (Add Mult : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_ring S A Add Mult O Opp -> forall a b d : S, divide S A Mult O d a -> divide S A Mult O d b -> divide S A Mult O d (Add a b)
div_mult : forall (S : Set) (A : S -> Prop) (Add Mult : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_ring S A Add Mult O Opp -> forall a b d : S, divide S A Mult O d a -> A b -> divide S A Mult O d (Mult a b)
gcdZ_i : forall a b x : Z, is_gcdZ a b x -> {x : Z | is_gcdZ a b x}
div_opp : forall (S : Set) (A : S -> Prop) (Add Mult : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_ring S A Add Mult O Opp -> forall a d : S, divide S A Mult O d a -> divide S A Mult O d (Opp a)
gcdZ_correct : forall a b : Z, is_gcdZ a b (gcdZ a b)
Z.bits_inj' : forall a b : Z, (forall n : Z, (0 <= n)%Z -> Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n) -> a = b
Z.land_comm : forall a b : Z, Z.land a b = Z.land b a
have_gcdZ = fun a b : Z => {d : Z | is_gcdZ a b d} : Z -> Z -> Set Arguments have_gcdZ (_ _)%Z_scope
Z_div_exact_full_2 : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = 0%Z -> a = (b * (a / b))%Z
gcd_OZ : forall b : Z, is_gcdZ 0 b (Z.abs b)
Z.div_mod : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> a = (b * (a / b) + a mod b)%Z
Zdiv_unique_full : forall a b q r : Z, Remainder r b -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> q = (a / b)%Z
Z.div_exact : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> a = (b * (a / b))%Z < -> (a mod b)%Z = 0%Z
Z.pow_eq_0 : forall a b : Z, (0 <= b)%Z -> (a ^ b)%Z = 0%Z -> a = 0%Z
Z.mod_small : forall a b : Z, (0 <= a < b)%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = a
gcdZ_exists : forall a b : Z, have_gcdZ a b
Z.mod_neg_bound : forall a b : Z, (b < 0)%Z -> (b < a mod b <= 0)%Z
Z.mod_pos_bound : forall a b : Z, (0 < b)%Z -> (0 <= a mod b < b)%Z
Z.div_small_iff : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a / b)%Z = 0%Z < -> (0 <= a < b)%Z \/ (b < a <= 0)%Z
Z.lcm_least : forall a b c : Z, (a | c)%Z -> (b | c)%Z -> (Z.lcm a b | c)%Z
Z.sqrt_sqrt_up_exact : forall a : Z, (0 <= a)%Z -> Z.sqrt a = Z.sqrt_up a < -> (exists b : Z, (0 <= b)%Z /\ a = (b * b)%Z)
Z.lxor_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.lxor a b) n = xorb (Z.testbit a n) (Z.testbit b n)
Z.lor_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.lor a b) n = (Z.testbit a n || Z.testbit b n)%bool
Z.land_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.land a b) n = (Z.testbit a n && Z.testbit b n)%bool
Z.div_lt_upper_bound : forall a b q : Z, (0 < b)%Z -> (a < b * q)%Z -> (a / b < q)%Z
Z.add3_bit0 : forall a b c : Z, Z.testbit (a + b + c) 0 = xorb (xorb (Z.testbit a 0) (Z.testbit b 0)) (Z.testbit c 0)
Z.pow_nonneg : forall a b : Z, (0 <= a)%Z -> (0 <= a ^ b)%Z

``` 
intros a b d H.
inversion H as [b|b a d q r H1 H2 H3 H4 H5].
apply unicity_is_gcdZ in H5.
rewrite H5.
apply gcdZ_correct.
Qed. 
```

original: intros a b d H. inversion H as [b|b a d q r H1 H2 H3 H4 H5]. apply unicity_is_gcdZ in H5. rewrite H5. apply gcdZ_correct.
